name: Kira's Pixel Shop
description:
Kira's Pixel Shop is a free VR game about pixel art, designed for the HTC Vive.

Take jobs as an artist, paint your own creations, buy and unlock new palettes, and become the most famous artist on all of Artsi!

Kira's Pixel Shop features:

  • A full pixel-art editor in VR
  • 30 unlockable color palettes
  • 50+ different jobs to take
  • Your own studio apartment to decorate with art
  • A handful of nice royalty-free lo-fi beats I found online
  • No microtransactions, IAPs, or ads
